programme.desc: Trapped on a mountain plateau at the heart of Asia, lies one of the most extreme desert environments in the world, The Gobi. .

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land Of Extremes
programme.desc: The Mongolian Steppe lies trapped between the Taiga forests in the North and the Gobi desert in the South. It's home to animals whose lives revolve around one essential thing: Grass. .

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land Of Extremes
programme.desc: Mongolia's Altai Mountains are a golden backdrop to some of the most iconic and elusive animals in the world. .

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Asia's Weirdest
programme.desc: Life isn‚Äôt easy. To survive one must adapt, but not all of evolution‚Äôs gifts are equal. Some animals are weirder than others‚Äîmeet the mutants.

programme.title: Freaks And Creeps
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucy's goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange.

programme.title: Ocean's Weirdest
programme.desc: Life can be a wild ride and nature can be a cruel mistress. When it‚Äôs adapt or die weird has the edge. Embrace the strange in Mutant Misadventures. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol: Compilation
programme.desc: Everyone at the clinic loves to lend a helping hand, even the patients and their owners. The team rushes to treat a dog with bloody paws, a pair of goats with a contagious skin condition, and visit a therapy farm for emotional support horses. The office is packed with support animals in need of care and the Pol vets will stop at nothing to get these hard-working pets on the road to recovery.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol performs emergency surgery on a dog that swallowed a rope toy. Dr. Nicole examines a tiny kitten with a big eye problem, and Dr. Lisa helps a horse suffering from heaves. A fungal infection glows on a Pomeranian while a lump grows on a Pitbull. The Pols celebrate their 55th wedding anniversary with cake decorated by grandkids, Silas and Abigail.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol treats three bovines and one tiny rabbit before heading to the Netherlands with Diane to celebrate his 80th birthday.
